name: avoid (itch) (james)
description:
Controls
Move left/right: arrow keys
Jump: z

Press 'z' on the title screen to start a level.

A 4kb Commodore 64  rhythm based game made for the 2020 Craptastic competition.

Avoid the blocks, jump over the red squares, collect the yellow dots.

https://reset64-magazine.itch.io/2020-reset64-4kb-craptastic-game-compo

C64 PRG file below.
